summary: Website for Talentblaze, a fractional talent acquisition service firm catering to startups in India and global firms setting up operations in India
architectural_notes: Website for talent acquisition service firm
Target audience: Indian startups and global firms entering India
Business model: Fractional talent acquisition services
known_issues: Contact number should not be displayed in contact section

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with hero section introducing Talentblaze as a fractional talent acquisition service firm for startups in India and global firms establishing operations in India
Create an About section explaining the fractional talent acquisition model and how Talentblaze serves its target markets
Create a Services section outlining key talent acquisition offerings relevant to Indian startups and global firms entering India
Create a Contact section with a contact form for potential clients to reach Talentblaze

Apply a professional, modern visual theme with warm, trustworthy colors (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography suitable for a B2B service brand, and cohesive spacing and layout patterns throughout all sections
Adjust font colors throughout the application to ensure sufficient contrast with background colors, making text clearly readable in both light and dark modes
Adjust the brand logo styling to blend properly with the website's warm amber/orange color scheme, ensuring visual harmony with the hero section background and overall theme
Remove the contact phone number from the ContactSection component, keeping only email and location contact information
Replace all placeholder or untrue data throughout the website with accurate, realistic content for Talentblaze's services, target markets, value propositions, and company information

Add comprehensive SEO meta tags to frontend/index.html including title, description, keywords, Open Graph tags, and Twitter Card tags optimized for Talentblaze's fractional talent acquisition services targeting Indian startups and global firms entering India
Create a robots.txt file in frontend/public allowing all search engine crawlers to index the entire site
Add structured data (JSON-LD schema) to frontend/index.html identifying Talentblaze as an Organization with relevant business information for enhanced Google search results
Remove the brand logo image from the HeroSection component and style the 'Talentblaze' text branding with an attractive color scheme that promotes the feeling of recruitment and talent acquisition

Replace the hero section's picture banner background with icon-based infographics that clearly showcase Talentblaze's key talent acquisition services and value propositions, ensuring font and content are clearly visible to end users

Update all references to years of experience throughout the website to display '12 years' or '12+ years' instead of the current value, ensuring consistency across all sections including About, Services, and any other content areas where experience is mentioned

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for Talentblaze talent acquisition service
Implement backend storage for contact form submissions with fields for name, email, company name, and inquiry message
Replace untrue/placeholder data with accurate content
Remove contact number from contact section
Add proper SEO meta tags for Google search indexing
Remove brand logo and style Talentblaze text with attractive recruitment-themed color scheme
Replace hero section picture banner with infographics showcasing services and content clearly
Update years of experience to 12 years throughout the website
